verses.text_en_pickthall: When Earth is shaken with her (final) earthquake
And Earth yieldeth up her burdens,
And man saith: What aileth her?
That day she will relate her chronicles,

verses.text_ar: يَوْمَئِذٍ يَصْدُرُ ٱلنَّاسُ أَشْتَاتًا لِّيُرَوْا۟ أَعْمَـٰلَهُمْ
verses.text_en_pickthall: That day mankind will issue forth in scattered groups to be shown their deeds.

verses.text_ar: فَمَن يَعْمَلْ مِثْقَالَ ذَرَّةٍ خَيْرًا يَرَهُۥ
verses.text_en_pickthall: And whoso doeth good an atom´s weight will see it then,

verses.text_ar: وَمَن يَعْمَلْ مِثْقَالَ ذَرَّةٍ شَرًّا يَرَهُۥ
verses.text_en_pickthall: And whoso doeth ill an atom´s weight will see it then.
